Articles.Content: I've been playing KSP for a while now, though I've never made it further than a Minmus landing. I actually made this account because I ran into and bug and was going to post a thread for help, but I fixed it as soon as I had everything set up to post the issue, so here I am. So smooth.
Hello PaladinFoster. Welcome to the forum.
Thank you, I hope I'll be able to contribute something interesting.
Please do. Folks here are pretty nice.
So far a thread already helped me think of a couple new ideas for exploring the Mun, so I think I'm off to a good start!

Glad someone could have helped! Good luck on exploring the mun!!

Laugh a little it makes the 'splosions more awesome!
Welcome to the forums, cause no trouble. Glory to Kerbin

Welcome! Glad to meet ya.

Very interested to hear your experiences with the Mun! Still working forward to that myself.
